title: UnboundLocalError Example
description: Demonstrate an UnboundLocalError (referencing a local variable before assignment).
instructions:
Run the code. You should see:
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "unbound_local_error.py", line 4, in <module>
    foo()
  File "unbound_local_error.py", line 2, in foo
    print(x)
UnboundLocalError: local variable 'x' referenced before assignment
```
